__e: "You are good, and you are clean, and none of this is your fault."
Why don't you clean them out, see what you can find?
You'd better come clean and tell us what this is really about.
[Clears throat] Okay, what do you want me to do?
Yes. For 27 years. But that's not why I'm here. [ Clears Throat ]
I mean-- [clears throat] Sure... if your mother says that it's okay.
You come back into the city and you clean up Dad's shit!
Even still, why don't you clean the gun up once you're back?
What the hell are you doing without cleaning the house?
The problem is simply that he never cleans the toilet, and I hate that.
You never get clear of something like this.
If I get clean, what do I have?
And before me she didn't have clean water to drink or a bed to sleep in, but now because of my $2,000, that's all going to change.
The head must be clear, to listen to what your heart has to say.
Well, you're already here, so why don't you just... clean this for a start?
A clean house is not the most important thing in the world.
Even the inside has to be cleaned?
My point being that this is a hell of a lot cleaner than all the others.
Nice mouth you got there... but I'm not going through this again.
You know a dog's mouth is cleaner than a human's?
